summary: Ex-C.I.A. Agent James Dial (Wesley Snipes) is asked to take out terrorist Ali Mahmud Jahar (Nikolai Sotirov), only to realize he's been set up by his former employer, Jeremy Collins (Ralph Brown).
cast: Wesley Snipes|Eliza Bennett|Lena Headey|Ralph Brown|Charles Dance|Gemma Jones|Iain Robertson|Richard Harrington|Ryan McCluskey|John Standing|Stanimir Stamatov|Miroslav Emilov|Velizar Binev|Nikolai Sotirov|Peter Kerry Morgan|Vladimir Kolev|Richard Tunley|Plamen Manassiev|Morgan Hopkins|Kiril Efremov|Mariana Stansheva|Hristo Mitzkov|Anelia Nikolova|Lucy Cooper|Ceri Mears|Svezhen Mladenov|Harry Anichkin|S.J. Evans|Carlyn Paschall
title: La trampa del asesino
